query:
SELECT
                *
            FROM
                eth_txs
            WHERE
                (
                    from_addr = $1
                    OR
                    (from_addr IS NULL AND $2)
                )
                AND is_gateway = $3
                AND id <= COALESCE(
                    (SELECT
                        eth_tx_id
                    FROM
                        eth_txs_history
                    JOIN eth_txs ON eth_txs.id = eth_txs_history.eth_tx_id
                    WHERE
                        eth_txs_history.sent_at_block IS NOT NULL
                        AND (
                            eth_txs_history.finality_status != 'finalized'
                        )
                        AND (
                            from_addr = $1
                            OR
                            (from_addr IS NULL AND $2)
                        )
                        AND is_gateway = $3
                    ORDER BY eth_tx_id DESC LIMIT 1),
                    0
                )
            ORDER BY
                id
